homePage.title: Desk Reservation

guide.part3: Search for the desk number in the list and click on the FREE button. If it is already reserved, please look for another.
guide.part4: On the next page fill out the form and click on the RESERVATION button after accepting the terms.

homePage.showReservationGuide: Click the 'My Reservations' button if you want to view your reservations.

reservationPage.title: Desk Reservations
reservationPage.text1: Choose the desk you want to reserve. Fill out the form and click on the RESERVATION button.
reservationPage.freeButtonHint: Click here, if you want to reserve this desk.
reservationPage.reservationfailed: The reservation failed. The selected desk may already be reserved.
reservationPage.reservationSuccess: The reservation has been successfully done!

reservationEditorPage.title: Manage Reservations
reservationEditorPage.description: You can edit or delete the desk reservations by using this administration page.
reservationEditorPage.editorButtonLabel: Click here, if you want to edit this reservation!
reservationEditorPage.deleteButtonLabel: Click here, if you want to delete this reservation!
reservationEditorPage.deleteConfirmation: Do you want to delete this reservation?
reservationEditorPage.saveSuccess: The reservation has been successfully saved!
reservationEditorPage.editorDescription: You can modify here the selected reservation.

showReservationPage.title: View Reservation
showReservationPage.description: Here you can see the details of your desk reservation.
showReservationPage.reservationNotFound: No reservation found with the given identifier.
showReservationPage.cancelReservationSuccess: Your reservation has been sucessfully cancelled!

loginPage.text1: In order to sign out, please click on the Logout button.
loginPage.text2: In order to sign in, please click on the Login button.
